title.rendered: DSL’s target of achieving $250 million in RMG exports by 2030.

content.rendered:
Dongyi Sourcing Limited, one of the prominent sourcing giants in Bangladesh, has set an ambitious target of achieving $250 million in readymade garment (RMG) exports by 2030. With a strong market presence and expertise in the industry, the company is poised to make significant strides toward this goal.

Driven by a dedicated and skilled team, Dongyi Sourcing Limited aims to leverage its extensive experience and industry know-how to expand its export capabilities. By continuously improving its infrastructure and fostering strategic partnerships, the company is confident in its ability to contribute to Bangladesh’s thriving RMG sector.

Under the visionary leadership of its CEO and Managing Director, Mohammad Pabel, Dongyi Sourcing Limited is committed to exploring new opportunities and implementing innovative strategies. With a focus on quality, efficiency, and sustainability, the company aims to establish itself as a key player in the global RMG market while driving economic growth in Bangladesh.
